features.heading: Everything you need in one place
features.subheading: Transform your long URLs into powerful marketing tools. Get detailed insights and manage your links with our advanced tools.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Track clicks, analyze visitor demographics, and monitor link performance in real-time with detailed statistics and visual reports.

shortening.title: Smart Link Shortening
shortening.description: Create concise, memorable links instantly. Customize your URLs with branded domains and custom slugs for better recognition.

management.title: Link Management
management.description: Organize, edit, and manage all your shortened links from one dashboard. Group links by campaigns and track their performance easily.
